privacyPolicy.section1Content:
We collect a variety of data to enhance your experience with our application, including:
- Personal identifiers such as your name, email address, and contact information.
- Photos you upload to our platform, including those cheeky selfies your ass.
- Device information, including your IP address and location data.
- Usage data, such as your interactions with the app and preferences.
privacyPolicy.section2Content:
The data we collect is used for a range of purposes, including:
- Improving our services and providing personalized content tailored to your interests.
- Displaying your stunning photos on websites for a modest fee of $10, so everyone can appreciate your ass.
- Sending you promotional offers and updates about our services, unless you opt-out.
- Conducting research and analysis to better understand our user base and market trends.
privacyPolicy.section3Content:
We take your privacy seriously and will only share your data in the following circumstances:
- With trusted third-party partners who assist us in delivering our services, provided they agree to uphold your privacy rights.
- If required by law or in response to a valid legal request, such as a subpoena.
- When you give us explicit consent to share your data with others.
- In the unlikely event of a company merger, acquisition, or asset sale, your data may be transferred to the new entity.

caution_lang: Caution! Changing the language will change the interface language, but the audio language will remain the same.
